arts.ttl: Chelsea fans handed more misery as Legia Warsaw manager fires parting dig at supporters after Conference League clash
Report: Arsenal & Chelsea keen on South American, club “would prefer” to sell in summer
arts.sum: Arsenal and Chelsea have been linked with a move for the Club Brugge defender Joel Ordonez, and the Ecuadorian could be sold in the summer. According to a report from Fichajes, both clubs are interested in the 20-year-old South American, and it will be interesting to see where he ends up. arts.ttl: 'If you don't prepare right, you will pay' - fears rise over Chelsea form
arts.sum: Chelsea may be through to the semi-finals of the Europa Conference League, but the boos that followed their surprise defeat by Legia Warsaw summed up the current mood of dissent at Stamford Bridge.

arts.ttl: Chelsea Europa Conference League semi-final opponent confirmed after Legia Warsaw win
arts.sum: They will now take on Djurgarden in the final four, with the Swedish side overcoming Rapid Vienna after extra time of the second leg. Djurgarden then took the lead from the penalty spot in the first half, before an own goal drew Vienna level in first half added time.

arts.ttl: Reece James gives brutally honest verdict on Chelsea's dismal Legia Warsaw defeat
arts.sum: The Blues still progressed to the semi-finals of the competition, but they put in a dreadful performance at Stamford Bridge and were booed off but supporters.

arts.ttl: Chelsea player ratings vs Legia Warsaw as Cucurella excels but Palmer struggles
arts.sum: Chelsea are through to the last four of the Conference League after beating Legia Warsaw over two legs, but the Blues were beaten this evening at Stamford Bridge. However, later in the half, Chelsea found a leveller through Marc Cucurella.

arts.ttl: Football transfer rumours: Man Utd's record-breaking Osimhen offer; Chelsea join Rashford race
arts.sum: Friday's football transfer rumours, with updates on Victor Osimhen, Marcus Rashford, Florian Wirtz, Alejandro Garnacho, Bernardo Silva & more.

arts.ttl: Maresca bemoans Palmer and Jackson’s droughts after poor Chelsea display
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca suggested after Chelsea’s poor display against Legia Warsaw in the Conference League that the form of forwards Cole Palmer and Nicolas Jackson is a major concern. arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca is concerned with the ‘easy chances’ Chelsea are not taking
arts.sum: The 2-1 loss to the team currently fifth in the Polish Ekstraklasa drew boos from supporters at full-time.
